humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest focus of invasion as 2.5 cm. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the size of the largest focus of invasion is 2.5 cm. According to the TNM staging system, a T2 stage is given to tumors that are greater than 2 cm in size but not greater than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
